Transcript: Hello, this is Rob Speedman calling from Post Spring in Baltimore. In a few short weeks, you and over 4000 art and framing professionals will experience our industry's newest event. While at the show, be sure to take advantage of our exciting new Certificate Education program. Also, plan to join us for a networking Happy Hour on Friday, April 28th from 5 to 6 p.m.. It's free! Don't hesitate to call us with questions at 888. We look forward to seeing you soon in the great city of Baltimore.
